name: BK Hostel
description:
Welcome to our friendly & clean hostel in the heart of Auckland city! We are only a short 5-minute stroll away from the nearest Airbus-stop on Queen Street. The hostel is situated on the corner of vibrant K-road, where you will find a great variety of supermarkets, (thrift) shops, bars, cafes and restaurants. On a sunny day outside, just cross the road and find yourself in beautiful Myers Park!

Cook a delicious meal in our well-equipped clean kitchen, relax in our lounge watching TV or one of the many DVD choices, or if you fancy it, play a game of pool with your new friends. Our priority is to offer you a clean, comfortable, and secure place to stay where you can feel at home.

If you enjoy your time in our hostel and want to stay with us longer, have a chat to the reception staff about our discounted short and long-term accommodation options.

We hope you have a great time in our hostel and enjoy your time in Auckland!

Please note that if guests book as a group, it cannot be guaranteed that they will be accommodated in the same room. This is subject to availability.

Guests are required to show a photo ID upon check-in. Please note that for international guests, you will need to show a valid passport. For domestic guests, you will need to show a valid photo ID (New Zealand drivers license or passport).

We reserve the right to refuse to accommodate anyone who is engaging in bad behaviour or illicit activities or whose admission would interfere with the operation of the hostel.
Minimum age is 18 (with, or without guardian).

-Check-in from 14:00 to 20:00
-Our cancellation policy: 24 hours notice
-The reception is open between 08:30 and 20:00 hrs.
